00029 #include "FakeBathCell.hpp"

00032 FakeBathCell::FakeBathCell(boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver> pSolver,
00033                            boost::shared_ptr<AbstractStimulusFunction> pIntracellularStimulus)
00034     : AbstractCardiacCell(pSolver, 1, 0, pIntracellularStimulus)
00035 {
00036     mpSystemInfo = OdeSystemInformation<FakeBathCell>::Instance();
00037     Init();
00038 }
00039 
00040 FakeBathCell::~FakeBathCell()
00041 {
00042 }

00044 // This method should never be called, but we implement it with something sensible just in case...
00045 #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00046 void FakeBathCell::EvaluateYDerivatives(double time, const std::vector<double> &rY, std::vector<double> &rDY)
00047 {
00048     rDY[0] = 0.0;
00049 }
00050 #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00051 
00052 double FakeBathCell::GetIIonic(const std::vector<double>* pStateVariables)
00053 {
00054     return 0.0;
00055 }

00057 void FakeBathCell::ComputeExceptVoltage(double tStart, double tEnd)

00059 }

00063 template<>
00064 void OdeSystemInformation<FakeBathCell>::Initialise(void)
00065 {
00066     // State variables
00067     this->mVariableNames.push_back("Fake voltage");
00068     this->mVariableUnits.push_back("mV");
00069     this->mInitialConditions.push_back(0.0);
00070 
00071     this->mInitialised = true;
00072 }
